articles.description: Kamala signals support for crypto. Top memecoins all soar, add $10bn in value in a week. MOODENG hits $180m, does 11x in a week. SUI & SEI continue to lead L1s for price & TVL growth. Revolut & Robinhood are considering stablecoin. Visa launches new tokenisation platform for banks. PayPal to allow business accounts to hold crypto Hamster kombat's HMSTER disappoints on launch. Biden admin may have forced Silvergate’s closure. Court rules crypto mining boxes ‘are securities’.
articles.title: FOMO HOUR 207 - WELCOME BACK TO THE BULL!

articles.description: BTC nears $65k key resistance level. Kamala makes positive comments about crypto. PayPal allows businesses to hold crypto. Visa allows banks to test RWAs & smart contracts. Cuban wants to be head of SEC. Silvergate claims about ‘Chokepoint 2.0’ grow. Truflation hacked for $5m. Telegram Wallet blocked in UK & US. Court rules crypto mining boxes are securities. Infinex DeFi platform raises $65m. Ethena announces new stablecoin linked to BUIDL.
articles.title: FOMO HOUR 206 - MEMES ARE PUMPING!

articles.description: SUI leads L1 gains as TVL crosses $1bn. Altcoin market cap close to breaking downtrend. SEI becomes top chain for 1 month TVL growth. ETH ETFs sees 3rd largest inflow ever. SEC delays ETH ETF options decision. SOL took most of ETH outflows over last 3 months. SOLETH continues to be trading at resistance. $8.1bn BTC options to expire this week. BTC heading to $500k-$1m in a year: PlanB. Stablecoin supply hits new ATH. Caroline Ellison sentenced to 2 years in jail. SBF & Diddy in the same jail. SEC settles against TUSD for not being collateralised. Gensler gets derided for crypto approach. Hester Pierce admits flaws in SEC crypto policy. Harris against regulation by litigation: Cuban. Golem claims ETH move to CEXs due to staking. Binance refutes data leak claims. Next Y combinator batch has ‘no crypto companies’. Celo overtakes Tron for stablecoin addresses.
articles.title: FOMO HOUR 205 - ALTCOINS CONTINUE TO RALLY!

articles.description: BTC needs to top $65.2k to put in a higher high. ETH ETFs see biggest outflow since July. ETH outperformance could be start of ‘alt season’. BlackRock gets 12hr BTC withdrawal from Coinbase. cbBTC only wrapped BTC to not show reserves. Telegram to share user data upon legal requests. EIGEN non-transferability to be removed Sep 30th. TIA announces $100m funding round. TIA deal was OTC token sale ‘done months ago’. Polymarket considers token, trying $50m raise. Maybe we will pay off debt with crypto: Trump. Harris unlikely to give full crypto policy pre-election. 13m Binance users’ data may have been leaked. Caroline Ellison likely won’t serve time in jail.
articles.title: FOMO HOUR 204 - MOODENG MOO-NING!

articles.description: Crypto funds saw $321m inflows last week. Kamala commits to crypto & AI expansion. TAO leads gains in AI hype, does 2x in 2 weeks. SUI TVL breaks $900m. Average Q4 returns for BTC is 88%. BTC Google searches down 75% since 2021. BTC 161 days from halving, when it rallied in 2020. Crypto VCs raised $2.2bn this year, well below 2021.
articles.title: FOMO HOUR 203 - KAMALA GOES PRO-CRYPTO

articles.description: SOL leads majors as Breakpoint begins. SOL launches Frankendancer on mainnet. Helio Pay allows Shopify items to sell on X. Franklin Templeton to launch fund on SOL. BTC short term holders fall at fastest rate in 12 years. MicroStrategy upsizes convertible note raise to $1bn. BingX loses $52m in hack. $243m crypto heist exposed by ZachXBT. Supreme Court of India hacked on X, shills scam. SocGen launches Euro stablecoin on SOL. Sky agrees to stop using WBTC. Germany shuts down 47 crypto exchanges. Stablecoin’s now 18th biggest holder of treasuries. Consensys lawsuit against SEC dismissed. Partisanship will stop Trump crypto plans: Hoskinson. Scaramucci working with Kamala on crypto.
articles.title: FOMO HOUR 202 - SOL STARTS TO SEND IT

articles.description: Crypto rips higher after Fed cuts 50bps. $22bn shorts would be liquidated by $70.5k. SUI continues to lead L1s, does 2.5x in a month. Trump buys burgers with Bitcoin. Bitcoin is hedge against US debt: BlackRock. Commerzbank to offer BTC & ETH trading. Solana unveils Seeker phone, $70m pre-orders Helius Labs raise $21.75m. WazirX hacker moves $32m ETH to Tornado cash. SEC made up crypto regulation ‘out of thin air’. BitGo to launch stablecoin. Revolut considers creating stablecoin. Ethena front-end gets hacked, funds safe.
articles.title: FOMO HOUR 201 - CRYPTO FLYS AFTER FED

articles.description: Bitcoin dominance rises ahead of Fed. May see short-term crash after Fed: Hayes. ETH underperformance may reverse soon: BitWise. Vitalik sings during Token 2049 appearance. SUI & FTM continue to outperform in L1s. BNB to introduce gasless stablecoin transfers. Tether market share hits 75%. Australia launches 3-year CBDC program. Russia to pay China in crypto for war supplies. USDC available for Brazil & Mexico bank transfers. We are one of the biggest users of blockchain: Dimon. Kamala may push crypto firms abroad: Nansen CEO. Dragonfly looking to raise $500m fund. Bitget users hit 45m, most growth from TON. Gensler pushed to clarify his stance on airdrops. Binance denies involvement in WazirX hack. Janus Henderson to tokenise fund. TON partners with Curve for stablecoin swaps. LINK & Fireblocks partner for stablecoin issuance. WalletConnect seat to airdrop 185m WCT tokens.
articles.title: FOMO HOUR 200 - DONALD TRUMP RECAP

articles.description: Dustin Stockton is known as the “Godfather of Political Finance” but he wasn’t always known this way. He was originally heavily involved in campaigning for Donald Trump and was the lead organizer of January 6. As the protest came closer, he realized things would go south and backed out. From home, he watched Trump supporters raid the capitol building. He knew his life was never going to be the same.
articles.title: How Jan 6. Organizer Became Meme Coin Kingpin

articles.description: Crypto majors bounce with stocks & gold after CPI. Kamala odds flip Trump after Presidential debate. SUI, FTM, ICP, TON lead gains in Alt L1s. Grayscale launches XRP trust, SUI to follow. FTX unstakes part of SOL position, large unlocks in Q1. 5 major announcements coming for SOL this month. SOL active addresses hits ATH for any blockchain. ETH dominance falls to 14%, lowest level in 3 years. AI coins strong as Nvidia & chip optimism returns. SWIFT set to build infrastructure for RWA trading. Coinbase launches wrapped Bitcoin product. ENS integrated with Venmo & PayPal. Pendle introduces Bitcoin yield pools at 45%. POPCAT gets Kraken listing, leads top SOL memes. SUNDOG breaks $300m after ByBit spot listing. Casino tokens rise, RLB up 100% in 2 weeks. Ape Punk sells in ‘heist’ for 10ETH. XCOPY editions & 1/1s see high sales. Fantasy Top trading volume continues to grow. Trump family set to launch crypto project Monday.
articles.title: FOMO HOUR 199 - SO ABOUT YESTERDAY

Now the marketplace is pushing forward with a digital wallet that bridges Bitcoin, Ethereum, and Solana as it eyes other future expansions. Lu discusses Magic Eden's evolution since its early days, along with valuable lessons learned in the turbulent crypto industry.

articles.description: Crypto rises with stocks after CPI falls again. Bitfinex BTC longs continue to grow. SUI again leads L1s, up 18%. FTX estate unstakes $24m SOL, still has $943m. Binance introduces SOL liquid staking. SWIFT introduces infrastructure for RWA transfers. Pendle launches Bitcoin yield pools. UK makes crypto legal property. India leads crypto adoption for second year. Vitalik won’t advertise L2s with multi-sig security. Based rollups seen as alternative future for ETH. Blockchain music start up raises $50m. Ford & Toyota file blockchain patents.
articles.title: FOMO HOUR 198 - THE GREAT APE HEIST!

articles.description: Crypto falls slightly after Presidential debate. Exchanges see highest BTC outflow since May. Be wary of Yen move for BTC: Hayes. SOL active addresses hit ATH. At least 5 massive SOL announcements coming: Mert. Binomial to introduce restaking on BNB. Indonesian exchange hacked for $22m. Atomic Wallet wins lawsuit over $100m hack. Lawyers argue Ellison shouldn’t go to jail. ENS integrated with Venmo & PayPal. Galaxy & State Street launch 3 crypto ETFs. Standard Chartered begins UAE crypto custody. AAVE leads resurgence in DeFi coins.

articles.description: BTC ETFs: +$29m, ETH ETFs: -$5m. BTC rallies, ETF has first inflow in 9 trading days. BTC may have put in first higher low in 6 months. Saylor predicts $13m price for BTC. Wealth advisors quickly adopting BTC: BitWise CEO. Binance among few firms to get Indonesia license. Spot trading on CEXs up 30% in August. SEC made $4.68bn from crypto firms in 2023. $5.6bn lost to scams in 2023. XRP security status may be unchallenged in appeal. EtherFi announces credit card on Scroll. Base has more DEX users than other L2s combined. Tether & Tron create taskforce against crime. TIA still only making $585 in daily fees. WLD investigated by Singapore police.
articles.title: FOMO HOUR 196 - THE INFLOWS RETURN!

articles.description: BTC: 55.3k (+2%), ETH: 2320 (+1%), SOL: 130 (0%). Top Gainers: FTM, TAO, BTT, AAVE, TON, ATOM. Crypto mini-bounce continues, BTC reclaims $55k. BTC RSI hits lowest level since July 2021. Bitfinex longs continue to grow aggressively. BTC hashrate hits another ATH. BTC could hit $90k on Trump election: Bernstein. BlackRock settles intraday BTC trades off-chain. Spot BTC ETFs have been a failure: Bianco. Power giant Tepco explores Bitcoin mining. ETH Foundation & Vitalik continue to sell ETH. Farcaster DAU’s down 95%.

articles.author: Ronaldo Marquez
articles.description:
On Tuesday, Bitcoin (BTC) fell below the critical $63,000 threshold, reflecting a broader decline in the cryptocurrency market, which has shed nearly $200 billion in total market capitalization over the weekend. 
 
This drop follows Bitcoin’s recent two-month peak of $66,500, achieved just last Friday, which had ignited bullish sentiment among investors looking forward to the last quarter of the year. However, a series of geopolitical developments, particularly rising tensions in the Middle East, may test the resilience of risk assets like Bitcoin. 
 
Bitcoin Under Pressure As Investors Sell Into Gold
 
Market expert Jeroen Blokland, founder of the Blokland Smart Multi-Asset Fund, noted that global investors are increasingly selling Bitcoin to purchase gold, a trend evident in the BTG char…
articles.title: Bitcoin Drops Below $63,000: Are Geopolitical Issues And Gold Movements To Blame?

articles.author: Jamie Redman
articles.description: On Monday, eigenlayer (EIGEN) made its debut on major exchanges, hitting a peak of $4.47 per token. However, by 1:30 p.m. EDT on Oct. 1, the price had dipped 12%, settling at $3.90 per coin. By 2 p.m. it was exchanging hands for $4.30 per unit. EIGEN Token Hits Crypto Market A new contender has […]
articles.title: EIGEN Token Enters the Crypto Scene, Sees Early Gains and 12% Price Drop

articles.author: Scott Matherson
articles.description:
Shiba Inu has made a name for itself over the years, and with each new partnership, the meme coin moves further away from the realm of being a ‘joke’ to being a mainstream investment option. Once again, the team behind the popular crypto project have made a major move after announcing a brand-new partnership. This partnership with Zama, “an open source cryptography company that builds state-of-the-art Fully Homomorphic Encryption (FHE) solutions for blockchain and AI.”
 
A New Frontier For Shiba Inu
 
Shiba Inu marketing lead and exec, Lucie, took to the X (formerly Twitter) platform to inform the SHIB community of an exciting new partnership. This partnership with Zama is in line with the team’s vision to create a Fully Homomorphic Encryption (FHE) system.
 
 
According to the post, lever…
articles.title: Shiba Inu Team Announces Major Partnership, Here’s The 411

articles.title: September Slump: Bitcoin Miners See 2024’s Lowest Revenue

articles.author: Tareq Sikder
articles.description:
Binance has recently registered as a Virtual Asset Service  
Provider with Argentina's National Securities Commission (CNV). 
This registration is a notable regulatory milestone for the  
company, marking its 20th such achievement globally. The approval allows  
Binance to offer its full range of services to users in Argentina.
Binance Focuses on Compliance
This development highlights Binance's focus on regulatory  
compliance. According to the company, it aims to promote safe and sustainable  
growth in the cryptocurrency industry, both in Argentina and worldwide. 
Binance has implemented a compliance program that includes anti-money  
laundering and counter-financing of terrorism policies. 

Proud to announce that #Binance has secured registration in Argentina! 🇦🇷We now have 2️⃣0️⃣ reg…
articles.title: Binance Secures 20th Regulatory Approval as a VASP from Argentina's CNV

articles.author: Jamie Redman

articles.author: Rubmar Garcia
articles.description:
Amazon is set to launch 1KIN Lab’s new Web3 gaming credit packs on its platform. The new service, developed by the company behind GR1D Network, aims to enhance users’ experience with exclusive content and early access opportunities within its GR1D TERMINAL platform and GR1D ecosystem.
 
 
Amazon Makes Deal To Change Gaming
 
1KIN Labs recently announced the launch of its GR1D TERMINAL platform and credit packs on Amazon. The project is set to offer a “unified discovery and management hub” for content across several networks and change blockchain-based gamers’ experience.
 
The new platform will allow users to explore the extensive Web3 gaming ecosystem and delve into numerous titles, aiming to transform how gamers discover, manage, and collect exclusive rewards across Web3 and simplify the…
articles.title: Amazon To Offer Credit Packs For Web3 Games, Here Are The Details

articles.author: Jake Simmons
articles.description:
Shiba Inu has published its latest hyper-casual game, Shiboshi Rush, now available for Android users. The game, described as an action-packed adventure, was announced today by Shiba Inu’s marketing lead Lucie (@LucieSHIB) via X. Lucie shared, “Get ready for Shiboshi Rush, the exciting new game from Shiba Inu Games! In this action-packed adventure, players will fend off the Shadowcat army with their Shiboshi army.”
 
Shiba Inu Releases Its Next Game
 
Shiboshi Rush is designed as a hyper-casual action game where players are tasked with assembling an army of Shiboshis to defeat the invading “Shadowcat forces.” Players must strategically place their troops and utilize multiplier gates to enhance their army’s size and strength. The ultimate goal is to overwhelm the enemy and destroy their cast…
articles.title: Shiboshi Rush: Shiba Inu’s Latest Game Hits Android Devices

articles.author: Rubmar Garcia
articles.description:
Ethereum’s co-founder, Vitalik Buterin, recently discussed war-related markets on prediction betting platforms. Buterin defended the existence of the Hezbollah betting section in Polymarket, noting their role as decentralized information tools for viewers.
 
 
Vitalik Buterin Backs Hezbollah Betting Section
 
On Monday, the crypto community discussed the existence of war-related betting markets after X user Legendary raised concerns. The community member said that having a dedicated Hezbollah section felt wrong as it made a war “look like a football game to bet on.”
 

 
 
Other members shared this sentiment, and agreed with the original post. However, many others countered the concerns, arguing that predicting markets on geopolitical problems is not trivializing.
 
Among the defenders, Vi…
articles.title: Vitalik Buterin In Favor Of Hezbollah Betting Section On Polymarket Amid Community Concerns

articles.author: Christian Encila
articles.description:
Arbitrum recently made headlines by breaking 1 billion transactions, a monumental number for decentralized finance. Data coming in from GrowThePie reveals that operations in DeFi alone make up over 20% of all transactions; the layer 2 scaling solution proves to be widely relevant to Ethereum. This feat not only demonstrates Arbitrum’s rapid expansion, but also its ability to transform the DeFi environment.
 
 
The Rise Of Arbitrage
 
Arbitrum, developed by Offchain Labs, is intended to address Ethereum’s scalability difficulties via a mechanism known as Optimistic Rollup. This enables for speedier transaction processing and lower fees, making it a popular choice among developers and consumers alike.
 
 
Arbitrum One just hit 1 billion transactions!
 
Onwards to the next billion. pic.twitte…
articles.title: 1 Billion Transactions Hit – How Did Arbitrum Reach This Milestone So Quickly?
